title: Hibiscus rosa sinensis
Vernacular name: English- China rose </br> Hindi- Babui </br> Gujarati- Jasud </br> Sanskrit- Ajaka </br>
Chemical Constituents: Carbohydrates, Lipids, Proteins, Nucleotides and nucleic acid
Therapeutic uses: Used to treat wounds, inflammation, fever, coughs, diabetes, infections caused by bacteria and fungi, and also used to treat hair loss, and gastric ulcers.
